# == DO NOT EDIT THE FOLLOWING LINES for the Raspberry Pi Pico VS Code Extension to work ==
if(WIN32)
    set(USERHOME $ENV{USERPROFILE})
else()
    set(USERHOME $ENV{HOME})
endif()
set(sdkVersion 2.1.0)
set(toolchainVersion 13_3_Rel1)
set(picotoolVersion 2.1.0)
set(picoVscode ${USERHOME}/.pico-sdk/cmake/pico-vscode.cmake)
if (EXISTS ${picoVscode})
    include(${picoVscode})
endif()
# ====================================================================================
# == DO NOT EDIT THE FOLLOWING LINES for the Raspberry Pi Pico VS Code Extension to work ==
if(WIN32)
    set(USERHOME $ENV{USERPROFILE})
else()
    set(USERHOME $ENV{HOME})
endif()
set(sdkVersion 2.1.0)
set(toolchainVersion 13_3_Rel1)
set(picotoolVersion 2.1.0)
set(picoVscode ${USERHOME}/.pico-sdk/cmake/pico-vscode.cmake)
if (EXISTS ${picoVscode})
    include(${picoVscode})
endif()
# ====================================================================================
# == DO NOT EDIT THE FOLLOWING LINES for the Raspberry Pi Pico VS Code Extension to work ==
if(WIN32)
    set(USERHOME $ENV{USERPROFILE})
else()
    set(USERHOME $ENV{HOME})
endif()
set(sdkVersion 2.1.0)
set(toolchainVersion 13_3_Rel1)
set(picotoolVersion 2.1.0)
set(picoVscode ${USERHOME}/.pico-sdk/cmake/pico-vscode.cmake)
if (EXISTS ${picoVscode})
    include(${picoVscode})
endif()
# ====================================================================================
# == DO NOT EDIT THE FOLLOWING LINES for the Raspberry Pi Pico VS Code Extension to work ==
if(WIN32)
    set(USERHOME $ENV{USERPROFILE})
else()
    set(USERHOME $ENV{HOME})
endif()
set(sdkVersion 2.1.0)
set(toolchainVersion 13_3_Rel1)
set(picotoolVersion 2.1.0)
set(picoVscode ${USERHOME}/.pico-sdk/cmake/pico-vscode.cmake)
if (EXISTS ${picoVscode})
    include(${picoVscode})
endif()
# ====================================================================================
set(PICO_BOARD pico2 CACHE STRING "Board type")

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)
message ( ${PICO_SDK_PATH} )
#set(PICO_SDK_PATH ~/Documents/Github/pico-sdk) 
message ( ${PICO_SDK_PATH} )
include(pico_sdk_import.cmake)

project(is_i2c_available_main)

# Initialize the SDK
pico_sdk_init()

# Add the executable
add_executable(is_i2c_available_main is_i2c_available_main.c)

# Link the Pico SDK libraries
target_link_libraries(is_i2c_available_main pico_stdlib hardware_i2c)

# Enable USB output, disable UART output
pico_enable_stdio_usb(is_i2c_available_main 1)
pico_enable_stdio_uart(is_i2c_available_main 0)

# Create map/bin/hex/uf2 files
pico_add_extra_outputs(is_i2c_available_main)
message ( ${PICO_SDK_PATH} )
